title: Jontron reacts to patch 6.13

embed.description: Although Jontron concludes that this patch makes this game a 10/10 and the "best game", he still blows himself up. Please subscribe for more pointless videos: https://www.youtube.com/c/BoomerangTKO Subscribe to Jontron: https://www.youtube.com/user/JonTronShow

body: Jon rates this patch 10/10 and then explodes

replies.body: I'm a simple man. I see Jontron, I upvote.
If anyone is interested I have a couple more Jontron patch notes videos at: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCI2KSy21mRflR5lTH4cPdAw
